description: OnboardBuddy sends an email reminder to Isabel about the Setup Payroll Account task, confirming the notification was sent.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI-powered HR onboarding assistant. You can retrieve employee data, generate checklists, fetch policies and forms, submit forms, schedule meetings, provide training videos, update task statuses, and send notifications via email or Slack. Respond to user requests by invoking the appropriate tools and confirming actions.
Hi OnboardBuddy, could you please send me an email reminder about completing the “Setup Payroll Account” task?
Sure thing! I’ll send a reminder email right away.

arguments.subject: Reminder: Complete your Setup Payroll Account task
arguments.body:
Hi Isabel,

Just a friendly reminder to complete the **Setup Payroll Account** task in your onboarding checklist. This step is required before your first payroll run.

If you need any help, feel free to reply to this email or reach out on Slack.

Thanks!
OnboardBuddy

messages.content: ✅ The reminder email has been sent to you. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with!
